onlyIncludeUpdateContainerInResponse

public static void onlyIncludeUpdateContainerInResponse(WORequest request,
                                                        WOResponse response)
Reads the updateContainerID from the url and then strips everything from the response except the updateContainer's html If the response is already an instance of AjaxResponse this method does nothing.

Parameters:
request -
response - the fully populated response to extract the update container from
